ygData.subject: RE: Location of High Quality Firing sheets
ygData.msgSnippet: Merra Clayfinger sells them in East Commons at the first Inn on the road from Freeport. ... From: marc.kazen@compaq.com [mailto:marc.kazen@compaq.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Merra Clayfinger sells them in East Commons at the first Inn on the road
from Freeport.


-----Original Message-----
From: marc.kazen@... [mailto:marc.kazen@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 12:08 PM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Location of High Quality Firing sheets


From: marc.kazen@...

Does anyone have a definitive list of the locations where I can buy
supplies? I located the pottery sketches in North Freeport next to the
bank, and clay in North Freeport in Groflath's Forge shop (by the Bard
guild). I can't seem to find High Quality Firing Sheets anywhere? Does
anyone know? Thanks.
